^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

NodeManager.description: This is a reference to the information of Node Manager.
NodeManager.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain a reference to the information of Node Manager.

FixedBootOrder.description: This is a reference to the information of Fixed Boot Order.
FixedBootOrder.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain a reference to the information of Fixed Boot Order.
